Definition: In this task, you will be given a sentence, followed by ", so". You should complete the given text with another sentence, such that the whole text is plausible. The sentence you enter must be a likely result of the given sentence.
Positive example 1-
input: The woman went to the bank, so 
output: she will be out with some cash on her
Positive example 2-
input: They government banned abortions, so 
output: many unwanted children will be born
Now complete the following example-
input: The physician misdiagnosed the patient, so 
output:
output: he was sent to the hospital
